title: Crime Alert 08.15.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 08.15.19
description:
Two men in jail after stealing a cop's gun, then getting into a shoot out with guess who? Man in jail after sending woman 10,000 explicit, threatening texts in 12 days. Man with only 7 days left on a 4 year sentence escapes.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
